trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur when a control is not found in the <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> of an imported form region.
trans-unit.target: 表示在导入的表单区域的 <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> 中找不到控件时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: If you import a form region that was designed in Microsoft Office Outlook, this exception can occur if you remove or modify the names of the controls that are described in the imported Outlook Form Storage (*.ofs) file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你导入在 Microsoft Office Outlook 中设计的窗体区域，则会发生此异常，如果您删除或修改导入 Outlook 窗体存储 (*.ofs) 文件中描述了控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: You can add, remove, or change controls on an imported form region by using the designer in Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加、 删除或更改使用在 Outlook 中设计器上的导入的窗体区域的控件。

trans-unit.source: Before you do this, back up any code that you added to the form region code file.
trans-unit.target: 执行此操作之前，请备份添加到窗体区域代码文件的所有代码。

trans-unit.source: Then, open the .ofs file in Outlook, modify the form region, and then save the changes.
trans-unit.target: 然后，在 Outlook 中打开 .ofs 文件，修改窗体区域并保存所做更改。

trans-unit.source: Use the **New Outlook Form Region** wizard to import the modified .ofs file.
trans-unit.target: 使用**新建 Outlook 窗体区域**向导以导入修改的.ofs 文件。

trans-unit.source: You can then paste your code into the new form region code file.
trans-unit.target: 然后可将代码粘贴到新的窗体区域代码文件中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ControlNotFoundException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ControlNotFoundException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that is not found in the <see langword="Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm" /> of the form region.
trans-unit.target: 在表单区域的 <see langword="Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm" /> 中未找到的控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ControlNotFoundException" /> class by using the name of a control that is not found in the <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> of an imported form region.
trans-unit.target: 使用导入的表单区域的 <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> 中未找到的控件的名称初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.ControlNotFoundException" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of a control that is not found in the <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> of an imported form region.
trans-unit.target: 获取导入的表单区域的 <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> 中未找到的控件的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the control that is not found in the <c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c> of the form region.
trans-unit.target: 表示在找不到控件的名称的字符串<c>Microsoft.Vbe.Interop.Forms.UserForm</c>的窗体区域。
